column1: Kata Robata////Food: We ordered the Texas Hamachi roll
column3: one order each of the toro and ika sashimi
column4: and one order each of the amaebi
column7: finished off with Halo-Halo for dessert. All were excellent. I normally don't like cooked or fried things in my rolls but the fried shrimp (along with the fresh jalapeno slices) in the Texas Hamachi gave a good crunch. I wasn't terribly impressed with the Halo-Halo but it was an interesting take.
